name: Lendigastel
description:
Misterious things happening at night in Lendigastel, arm yourself and go for a walk in the alleys of this town to shed light on this ... watch out for yourself ... good luck!

Hotkeys :

  • F11 or ALT +ENTER : Toggle fullscreen
  • LEFT CLICK: Shoot
  • RIGHT_CLICK: Reload

source code and assets available on github
